thread.title: Jesus davila

author: Jesus davila
title: Jesus davila
text: Hi visited Huntington certicare pre-own. Looking for a work truck angel falcon the sales person was very knowledge. And there the inventory Show me a 2016 dodge hemi big horn. White which I fell in love with I had a good down payment. But credit challenge june Torres the finance manager was great. And. Got me a loan. Aprove and I was able to drive. The dodge truck home next day I was denlal of a loan in another dealer they had me waiting 1 week giving me run around angel and june took. Good care of me I will recommend. Huntington pre-own certicare to all my family and friends I am very happy that I have the beautifull. Work truck for work. thank you angel and june
